pages.text:
Homeowner Club Memberships
The Island Club Homeowner Membership Program now offers a wide range of options that meet every homeowner’s unique needs, making it an increasingly popular choice for those seeking to take full advantage of the island’s rich offerings.
Become A Member
The Island Club at North Captiva
Admiral Program
Property management and marketing will consume a significant amount of time and energy. That’s why we have The Admiral Program (formerly known as the Rental Program). This allows homeowners to outsource their property’s comprehensive management and marketing to the club with exclusive benefits and perks such as 50% off ferry rides and store discounts.
Sign Me Up!
The Island Club at North Captiva
Partner Program
This is our newest membership offering specifically designed for homeowners who have a reliable property manager in place but wish to extend their property’s reach by allowing the Island Club to market their homes. As part of this program, your property would be listed on The Island Club’s website and added to our marketing platform, ensuring its visibility to a wider audience. The partnership also allows your guests to utilize the club membership.
Sign Me Up!
The Island Club at North Captiva
Club Member Program
This program is designed for homeowners who rent their home but have already established property management structures and reservation systems in place but want their guests to be able to access their club membership
Sign Me Up!
The Island Club at North Captiva
Commander Membership
This membership is designed for homeowners who are not renting their homes but would like their immediate family to have access to The Island Club, as well as some other discounts at the store and at Mangos. Homeowners who don’t want to rent out their homes would find the Social Member program an ideal fit.
Buy Membership
Become A Member

Are You Ready Yet?
The Island Club Homeowner Membership Programs infuse the North Captiva homeownership experience with carefully curated benefits that amplify your and your guests experiences. To schedule a review of which plan is best suited for you, please fill out the form below and someone from our team will contact you to schedule a meeting.
Become A Member

Are You Ready Yet?
The Island Club Homeowner Membership Programs infuse the North Captiva homeownership experience with carefully curated benefits that amplify your and your guests experiences. To schedule a review of which plan is best suited for you, please fill out the form below and someone from our team will contact you to schedule a meeting.
Become A Member

Welcome North Captiva Homeowners
Register Guests
Maintenance
The Island Club is here for you. We are the island’s only comprehensive service provider with comprehensive property management, reservations, guest services, food and beverage, and transportation offerings.  Our mission is to be a steward of the piece of paradise we feel humbled to be a part of. We want to make it simple for you to care for your investment, whether you live here full time, part time, or rent your home – we have something for everyone.
We’ve got you Covered!
Sit back and relax! We are your “one-stop-shop” for all your vacation home property management needs. Our stress-free processes and streamline billing will quickly get you back to enjoying your home!
Electrical
Housekeeping
HVAC
Landscaping
Locksmith
pest control
Plumbing services
Pool Service

Water Treatment
Wifi
News & Events
Stay up to date on our latest articles, press releases, and what we are doing to serve and bring change to our community.
